content.text:
# Battle of Şarköy

, page 91-93
}}
The Battle of Şarköy or Şarköy operation (, ) took place between 9 and 11 February 1913 during the First Balkan War between Bulgaria and the Ottoman Empire. The Ottomans attempted a counter-attack, but were defeated by the Bulgarians at the Battles of Bulair and Şarköy.
